Name: Fast Coffee Simulator
About the game: Fast Coffee Simulator is a casual simulation game where you are the manager of a Drive-Thru coffee shop. Your job is to prepare and deliver to customers their drinks before the time is up along with the patience of your customers. In this game you will have a large number of possible combinations to prepare different drinks, from the most casual to the most aberrational. Complete all the orders, unlock the achievements and beat your record over and over again.
